General.Name: Ocean Sun As
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Ocean Sun AS develops floating power system with solar panels. Its system consists of one or multiple floaters anchored side-by-side to build larger power plants, as well as takes local water depth, wave, current, and wind conditions into consideration. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Fornebu, Norway.
